syntax_editor_macro.comments: This editor macro creates the code necessary to access the function contained in the AppBuilderAclInsertOrUpdate script include.
syntax_editor_macro.name: AppBuilderAclInsertOrUpdate
syntax_editor_macro.text: var AppBuilderAclInsertOrUpdate = x_snc_devtools.AppBuilderAclInsertOrUpdate; AppBuilderAclInsertOrUpdate( grApp, 'record', 'read', 'incident', 'allow', 'This ACL allows ITIL users to acces the incident table', ['itil']);
